text: Southeast Asia is my favorite region on
earth there's a reason why I've chosen
to spend the majority of the last half
decade living and traveling across these
11 amazing nations from the nature to
the people the convenience the lifestyle
and the affordability here are my five
top recommended experiences in Southeast
Asia one halong bay all the way up in
northeastern vietnam is this stunning
UNESCO site which is made of thousands
of small limestone islands of different
shapes and sizes taken overnight cruise
through this majestical landscape and
feel like you are living on another
planet two motorbike around Bali as
touristy as it may be Bali is the
definition of paradise each of the four
times I've been there I've rented a
motorbike for five bucks a day and then
roamed around the island freely you will
see nothing but beautiful rice fields
long coastlines unique Hindu temples and
you'll come face to face with monkeys
and smiling locals who will make you
never want to leave penang food binge
ever wonder what's the street food
capital of Asia it's not Bangkok or
Singapore or Tokyo it's the small state
of Penang in northwestern Malaysia
heavily influenced by Chinese settlers
but also nearby Thailand the street food
in Penang is outstanding get inside a
hawker centre or an open-air food court
to try char koay teow
laksa and Chen dal for anchor temple
hopping anchor is the former capital of
the Khmer Empire which flourished from
the 9th to 15th centuries thousands of
temples were built during this time some
of which are in ruins today and others
are perfectly maintained such as ankor
wat the largest religious monument in
the world they are all very accessible
from Siem Reap which is an amazing city
in itself five share Gao in the fifth
home to just 90,000 people this quiet
teardrop-shaped
island is one of my favorite getaway
spots in the Philippines similar to Bali
I recommend exploring the island by
motorbike to discover some of the most
beautiful beaches and remote local
villages spend a day going island
hopping and your mind will be blown from
the natural beauty I hope you will
consider having these amazing
experiences on your next trip to
Southeast Asia if you have any other
questions or need some advice on the
region please let me know in the
comments below
I'm drew pinsky and if you like my
travel videos please click Subscribe and
join me as I plan to visit every country
in the world
